html: A salaried GP with a median taxable income of £52,600 will get a pay rise of up to £1,052 in 2018-19. A Band 3 prison officers with modernised terms and conditions will get a pay rise worth 4.1 per cent on average in 2018-19.
text:
A salaried GP with a median taxable income of £52,600 will get a pay rise of up to £1,052 in 2018-19.
 
A Band 3 prison officers with modernised terms and conditions will get a pay rise worth 4.1 per cent on average in 2018-19.

html: As a result of this rise : Teachers earning under £35,000 will get a pay rise equivalent to £800 in 2018-19. The average member of the armed forces will get a pay rise worth £980 in 2018-19. A police constable on an average wage will get a pay rise worth £760 in 2018-19.
text:
As a result of this rise :
 
Teachers earning under £35,000 will get a pay rise equivalent to £800 in 2018-19.
 
The average member of the armed forces will get a pay rise worth £980 in 2018-19.
 
A police constable on an average wage will get a pay rise worth £760 in 2018-19.
